word: \n     When the time came for this meeting-house to be built, there was another test of faith and loyalty. We had a council to consider what should be done. The way seemed hedged about with difficulties. Some said: \"Enclose a small building, and when money shall come in, enlarge; for we can not possibly complete at this time such a house as we desire.\" Others said, \"Wait till we have money with which to build a commodious house.\" This we thought to do; but the word of the Lord came to me in the night season, \"Arise, and build without delay.\"
